meanings.definition: The state of belonging to a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: Her membership in the book club brought her joy.
meanings.sent2: The gym's membership has been steadily increasing.
meanings.sent3: His membership in the secret cookie club was revealed when crumbs fell out of his bag.
meanings.sent4: Being part of the team gave her a sense of membership in something greater.
meanings.sent5: The membership fee was well worth the benefits of joining.

meanings.definition: The number or body of members in a group.
meanings.sent1: The membership of the chess club is limited to twenty players.
meanings.sent2: The membership of the jury reached a unanimous decision.
meanings.sent3: The membership of the exclusive club included only the wealthiest individuals.
meanings.sent4: The membership of the choir harmonized beautifully during the performance.
meanings.sent5: The membership of the team celebrated their victory together.

meanings.definition: The status of being a member.
meanings.sent1: His membership granted him access to special events.
meanings.sent2: The membership of the council voted on the new policy.
meanings.sent3: The membership of the group was highly sought after.
meanings.sent4: She valued her membership in the community for its support.
meanings.sent5: The membership of the organization was proud of their accomplishments.
